Introduction
This topic contains general information about other respiratory disabilities, including
deviated nasal septum
sinusitis
considering allergic rhinitis within scope of claimed sinusitis
rhinosinusitis
allergic rhinitis
constrictive bronchiolitis
complete organic aphonia and special monthly compensation (SMC)
spontaneous pneumothorax
, and
gunshot wounds (GSWs) of muscle groups (MGs) I to IV and XXI
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Respiratory Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
